description:
Set an extra bike up for use with your Thule Trailer with this Maxle axle adapter. This adapter replaces the thru axle on your bike's rear wheel, letting you install the trailer's ezHitch.

  • Easy installation
  • Works with: Chariot Cross, Chariot Lite, Chariot Sport Cadence and Coaster XT
name: Thule Thru Axle Maxle (M-12 x 1.75)
